messages.content: You are a helpful AI assistant.
What is the main topic of the news and gossip in Bennington?
The gunfight last night on the edge of the forest.
You are a helpful AI assistant.
How many gangsters were killed in the gunfight?
Three gangsters were killed.
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What is the purpose of the meeting at the Police Station?
To organize a manhunt to find Lucas Strong’s missing daughter and catch the escaped gangsters.
You are a helpful AI assistant.
Who kidnapped Jane Strong?
G Sidney Harris and his gang.
You are a helpful AI assistant.
Who kidnapped Jane Strong?
G Sidney Harris and his gang
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What was the ransom demanded by Harris for Jane's return?
You are a helpful AI assistant.
How many police officers were shot by Harris and his gang?
Two
You are a helpful AI assistant.
Where are the escapees believed to be holding Jane?
The forest
You are a helpful AI assistant.
Who demanded a ransom of $10,000 for Jane's return?
G Harris
You are a helpful AI assistant.
Who is offering a $25 per day reward for helping in the hunt for Jane?
Lucas Strong
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What will Strong pay to anyone willing to help?
He’s willing to pay anyone who is willing to help, “Man or woman, black or white, I don’t care. Just bring my little girl home and you’ll be paid!”
You are a helpful AI assistant.
Where can investigators buy additional weapons or equipment?
Arthur J. Spence’s Hardware and Gun Store on Main Street
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What is the deadline for the investigators to get their supplies and equipment together?
They are given until noon (two hours)
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What will the sheriff do if the investigators press Strong for more money or make a scene?
The sheriff will take objection and warn the investigators to mind their manners.
You are a helpful AI assistant.
Where can investigators buy additional weapons or equipment?
Arthur J. Spence’s Hardware and Gun Store on Main Street
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What should investigators do if they are looking for unusual equipment?
They may have to call on luck
You are a helpful AI assistant.
Why is it difficult for investigators to find certain items?
Because the town is essentially a frontier town and some items may be impossible to buy within the time frame
You are a helpful AI assistant.
Will all equipment and weapons be available for purchase?
No, some items will be impossible to buy in the time the investigators have
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What is the name of the store where Spence's Hardware and Gun Store is located?
Spence's Hardware and Gun Store on Main Street
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What kind of articles can investigators find in the local library or newspaper office to learn about the forest's use as a hideout?
Articles about the forest being used as a hideout for fugitives trying to evade conscription into the Union Army
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What has Harris planned to do with the forest?
It is not specified what Harris has planned to do with the forest, but it is mentioned that Harris is using the forest
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What team did Strong recently send out to survey for precious minerals?
A geological team to survey for precious minerals in what will become the reservoir’s bed
